mapper.select: select a.clppno,a.clppnm,c.imgnm from ORD_SAMPLE_CLHD a inner join ORD_SAMPLE_CLDTL b on a.clppno=b.clppno left join (select a.* from ORD_SAMPLE_CLPHT a where not exists(select 1 from ORD_SAMPLE_CLPHT b where a.clppno=b.clppno and a.id>b.id)) c on a.clppno=c.clppno where a.ormtno=#{ormtno} and a.bradno=#{bradno} and a.clppst=1 and b.sampno=#{sampno}

select b.*,e.sampnm,c.imgnm,d.imgnm as sampno_imgnm,d.thumb as sampno_thumb from ORD_SAMPLE_CLDTL b inner join ord_sample_design e on b.sampno=e.sampno inner join ord_sample_photo d on b.sampno=d.sampno left join (select a.* from ORD_SAMPLE_CLPHT a where not exists(select 1 from ORD_SAMPLE_CLPHT b where a.clppno=b.clppno and a.id>b.id)) c on b.clppno=c.clppno where b.clppno=#{clppno}
